name: House Designer: Fix & Flip
description:
House Designer is a simulator that allows you to try yourself as an interior and landscape designer, using your imagination, creativity and creative ideas. Buy abandoned houses, renovate and decorate them. Give them a second life and live in them or sell them for a profit!

At the beginning of the game you will have access to a small but cozy house. There you will be able to practice and start to reveal your skills as a designer in search of your interior style.

Using all the tools in your kit, you will have to perform tasks to clean and furnish houses and lots. Earn experience and improve your skills and abilities.

Experiment with the hundreds of interior furnishings and decorations available in a variety of styles and colors. Start by furnishing a kitchen or a cozy bedroom. Make your own recording studio in the basement or decorate a children's room. Use a wide range of floor and wall coverings to decorate your home to your taste.

Create harmony and beauty on your property.Plant flowers and arrange decorative flower beds with exotic plants. Install a gazebo, place comfortable chairs in it, or tile the pool area and place sun loungers. It's all up to you. Plan the whole area according to your imagination.

Enjoy hours of fascinating repairs with realistic interior models. A large number of interesting locations with their own history and curiosities lie ahead.
